name: Rollout
description: Rollout is a multiplayer "eat-to-grow" game set in a three(technically four)-dimensional world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: None
